description: Fleetwood bring in defender Brandon Cover from Leicester City and striker Kobei Moore from Aston Villa on loan.
title: Fleetwood Town: Brandon Cover and Kobei Moore sign on loan
title_page: Fleetwood Town: Brandon Cover and Kobei Moore sign on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Fleetwood Town have signed Leicester City defender Brandon Cover and Aston Villa forward Kobei Moore on loan for the rest of the season.
Cover, 21, has played once for the Foxes senior team and for the Jamaica national team.
He spent the first half of the campaign on loan at fellow League Two side Port Vale, where he appeared in 20 games and scored twice.
Moore, 20, has yet to play a senior game for Villa but has scored 13 goals in 37 games for the club's under-21 side.
His move to Fleetwood will be his first experience of first-team football.
